casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Tony Luwon EVANS. No. 104P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 10, 2008. LaToya B. Powell, Assistant Attorney General, Roxann Vaneekhoven, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of March 2008 by Defendant for Petition for Writ Certiorari in the Court of last resorts under 15A-1422(c)(3), 15A-1442(3)(4)(c)(E)(5)(a, b, c)(5B)(a, b, c), 15A-1443(a) Rule 21(a)(1)(2):

*884"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of April 2008."
